resources.string: Set the country automatically using your current location
Ask before calling when an emergency number is pressed
Select your country from a list
The app is completely open-source so you can contribute and take a look at the code.
Meet who is behind this app

This app should never be used when not related to emergencies. The cost of the calls is borne by the caller and the rates may vary. Not all numbers are free. This application only facilitates the search of the emergency numbers with your location. Its proper functioning depends on the network coverage and your phone carrier.
Quickly learn how to best use this app\'s features.
"This app was developed @ USI by the following students:"
Disable \"Always use current location\" in settings to be able to change country

Disclaimer
 This app should never be used when not related to emergencies. The cost of the calls is borne by the caller and the rates may vary. Not all numbers are free. This application only facilitates the search of the emergency numbers with your location. Its proper functioning depends on the network coverage and your phone carrier.

 How can I add my own contacts?
 In the Emergency tab, you can press on the add button at the bottom right to add new contact from your library. Press on it to start a call.

 How can I change the country?
 Tap the current country name or flag in the toolbar and choose another country. You can also turn on the "Always use current location" feature so that the selected country always reflects the country you are in.

 I found a bug and I have some feedback, what can I do?
 Please contact us via email and tell us everything you have to say. We are always listening!
